attributes.action: Honour all our servicemen and women passed and present with Jubile Medal
attributes.additional_details:
Honour all our Service Personal, passed and Present, with the Queen's jubile Medal.
They give their lives for our country, Sign this petition to honour and support them.
Remember   Afghanistan, Iraq, N.Ireland, Falklands and more.
PLEASE SIGN OUR PETITION HONOUR OUR SERVICEMAN AND WOMEN
